Dear {!Ticket__c.GLOBAL_Customer_Name__c}
Your (Freedom of Information Request / Environmental Information Request / Subject Access Request) has been received by the Customer Relations Team, who will either respond to it or pass it on to someone who can.
The target for responding to this request is 20 working days for Freedom of information and Environmental Information requests, and 40 calendar days for Subject Access Requests.
